Ok, well, I guess I will be happy with an archmage around experience 
level 250 or so and leave anything higher to my imagination.

If you guys get around to working on Gladiator:BF again, let me know 
so I can test those limits for you guys.  Archmages really should be 
restricted in intelligence to prevent accidental spillovers in 
summoning images/fire elementals.  At level 220, I can summon fire 
elementals that cross over with too much magic power.

Beyond that, I am pretty sure with exactly 2 scenarios, that I reach  
experience levels above 100 and below 300.  

It is very difficult to get a character above 230 or so experience 
because of well thought financial difficulities and the amount of 
experience it takes to get to the next level.  Good job guys in 
preventing the game from crashing.

Thanks for responding.
